content:
I've been using Duolingo and Quizlet, and they're really helpful in improving my vocabulary and grammar. Duolingo is so engaging and fun, and I love the gamification aspect of it. Quizlet is great for flashcards and testing my knowledge of new words.

As for the ESL classes, they're really helpful in improving my conversation skills. We have a lot of discussions and role-plays, which help me practice my speaking and listening. Mrs. Johnson is a great teacher, and she gives us a lot of feedback and encouragement. We're currently focusing on grammar and vocabulary building, and I'm hoping to improve my writing skills soon.

By the way, I was wondering if you could recommend any English language learning YouTube channels or podcasts that focus on conversation and speaking skills? I'd love to improve my speaking fluency and learn more conversational phrases and idioms.
